review: Probably every movie ever made can be found on the fire stick, but getting it for free is a different story. I find that basically only a handful are completely free providing you have prime membership. This is very disappointing and the free titles consistently change so one day something will be free the next they want $15 for it. It was a nice idea, but it is clearly just a way for Amazon to make more money. The other thing that really upsets me is that every time I try to watch a movie I get green lines across my screen. I have called Amazon and try to resolve this three times and I am basically giving up now because they cannot fix it. They do not want to send me a new fire stick under any circumstances and this is very disappointing. So if you don't mind shelling out hundreds of hundreds of dollars you should definitely get a fire stick. Again it was a good idea but it is not for me.
author: Marshall Dworkis "Broadway lover"
